plans_onetime.text: You get: Tyee Builder lapel pin. Editorial reports. Swag giveaways. Tyee event discounts. That warm fuzzy feeling that comes with holding power to account.
You get: the pin, reports, giveaways and discounts. Plus twice the warm fuzzies.
You get: the pin, report-backs, giveaways, discounts and a virtual high-five from everyone who values Canada's democracy.
You get: the pin, reports, giveaways, discounts, and the frosty glare of one government communications staffer.
You get: everything in previous levels, plus FREE registration in a Tyee Master Class webinar on investigative research by Tim Groves. Limit 50.
You get: everything in the previous levels, plus an invitation to an annual strategy meeting with Tyee editors.
